title: China asks its carmakers to keep key EV technology at home
description: China has urged its carmakers to keep advanced EV technology within the country, even as they build factories abroad to avoid tariffs. The Ministry of Commerce advised exporting knock-down kits for final assembly overseas and warned against investments in India. This move aims to protect China's EV industry know-how.
